Description.Text:
Property Location
Hudson New York, Central Park is in the heart of New York, walking distance from Time Warner Center and Columbus Circle. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Broadway.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 866 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hudson New York, Central Park. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in New York? This hotel has 6972 square feet (627 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hudson New York, Central Park. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.
Make yourself at home in one of the 866 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Hudson New York, Central Park is in the heart of New York, walking distance from Time Warner Center and Columbus Circle. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Broadway.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Time Warner Center - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Columbus Circle - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of Arts and Design - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of Biblical Art - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
David H. Koch Theater - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Dante Park - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Avery Fisher Hall - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Metropolitan Opera House - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
New York Public Library for the Performing Arts - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Damrosch Park - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Carnegie Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ed Sullivan Theater - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Juilliard School - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
August Wilson Theater - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hudson New York, Central Park is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hudson, A Morgans Original are:
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 21.9 km / 13.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hudson, A Morgans Original is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Facility Fee:Rate does not include a 29.95 $ + TAX mandatory facility Fee per night, per room.It includes: high-speed wireless internet (WiFi) for up to 4 devices at 10MB of bandwidth; All local phone calls; Unlimited use of our 24 hour Fitness Centre; Daily fodd & beverage credit of $10.00 per day -which may not be rolled over to the following day or used in conjunctionwith any other offer. Amenities and facility fee do not include any service gratuities.

Facility TAX: La tarifa no incluye el Facility Tax obligatorio de 29.95 $ + IVA por noche y por habitaci¢n. Incluye: WiFi de alta velocidad para 4 dispositivos a 10MB de ancho de banda; llamadas locales; uso ilimitado 24h de la zonaFitness Center; un crdito de $10.00 diario en comida y bebida - no puede ser acumulado para el d¡a siguiente ni con ninguna otra oferta. No incluye la propina por servicio.

UMAMI BURGUER WILL BE CLOSE TEMPORARILY DUE TO REFURBISHMENT WORKS IN THE AREA. THE BREAKFAST WILL BE CONTINENTAL AND SERVED IN HUDSOR BAR. THE GUESTROOMS WON'T HAVE ANY IMPACT, AS THEY ARE LOCATED IN A DIFFERENT AREA IN THE HOTEL EL UMAMI BURGUER ESTARA CERRADO TEMPORALMENTE DEBIDO A OBRAS EN EL AREA. EL DESAYUNO SERVIDO SERA EL CONTINENTAL EN EL HUDSOR BAR. LAS HABITACIONES DE LOS HUESPEDES NO SE VERAN AFECTADAS POR ESTAS OBRAS DEBIDO A QUE SE ENCUENTRAN EN UN AREA DIFERENTE DEL HOTEL.

Deluxe room has only 1 bed and it is for maxium 2 people/ La habitacion deluxetiene solo una cama y ocupacion maxima de dos personas Deluxe Double Double has 2 double beds/ Deluxe Doble Doble tiene dos camas dobles. Deluxe Studio has one bed and space available for an extra bed/ Deluxe Studio tiene una cama y espacio disponible para una cama extra. One bedroom Suite has one bed and space available for an extra bed/ Suite 1 habitaciones tiene una cama y espacio para cama extra.

AS MANDATED BY THE CITY OF NEW YORK HOTEL'S SKY TERRACE WILL BE UNDER RENOVATION WORKS AND CANNOT WELCOME GUESTS UNTIL THE REPOINTING HAS BEEN COMPLETED. THE WORK WILL TAKE PLACE APPROXIMATELY 7:00AM TO 3:00PM AND SINCE THE WORKS ARE NOT CLOSE TO ANY GUEST ROOMS, THE HOTEL DOES NOT ANTICIPATE ANY SIGNIFICANT NOISE ISSUES // POR MANDATO DE LA CIUDAD DE NUEVA YORK LA TERRAZA DEL HOTEL ESTARA CERRADA POR REFORMAS Y NO PODRA RECIBIR A LOS CLIENTES HASTA SU FINALIZACION. LAS OBRAS DURARAN APROXIMADAMENTE DESDE LAS 7:00AM HASTA LAS 3.00PM PERO NO SE PRODUCIRAN CERCA DE NINGUNA HABITACION POR LO QUE EL HOTEL NO ESPERA QUE HAYA RUIDOS SIGNIFICANTES.

***EXTRA BED COST $40*** ***CAMA SUPLETORIA $40*** IMPORTANT: ROLLAWAY BEDS ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR ALL ROOM TYPES. *WHEN BOOKING A ROOM FOR 3 PAX THE COST OF THE ROLLAWAY FOR THE 3RD PAX IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE PRICE. *THERE ARE NO ROOMS THAT CAN TAKE 5 PAX. *CRIBS ARE COMPLEMENTARY,BASED ON AVAILABILITY AND SHOULD BE REQUESTED PRIOR TO ARRIVAL.

OCCUPANCY TAX 3.5 $ IS INCLUDED IN THE RATE // LA OCCUPANCY TAX 3.5 $ YA ESTA INCLUIDA EN LA TARIFA

Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
